Elements Of Data Visualization: Project 2, Exoplanet Analysis
===
__By Alex Cortez, Adam Hernandex, and Alex Pearce__

__GitHub__: https://github.com/joseacortez91/DV_RProject2

This project deals with creating interesting graphs of exoplanet data from (Where ever this data is from), using packages like tidyr and dplyr, as well as ggplots2.

## Load necessary packages
```{r message=FALSE}
source("../01 Data/load_packages.R",echo=TRUE)
```

## Database Creations
```{r message=FALSE}
source("../01 Data/create-df.R",echo=TRUE)
```

## Data Wrangling

### Isolate mass and radius, grouping the data set into ten percentiles by mass, and generate summary results
```{r message=FALSE}
source("../02 Data Wrangling/mass_radius.R",echo=TRUE)
```

### Plot the curve to show increase in mass and radius at each percentile
```{r message=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=7.5}
source("../03 Visualizations/mass_radius_analysis.R", echo=TRUE)
```
